name: MazaoHub
description: Mazaohub gathers climate information with   IoT devices to measure various climate, soil moisture, crop health, irrigation system, and plant condition parameters across a wide range of crops, be it specialty or row crops. Using artificial intelligence,we process and interpret this data, offering personalized agronomy guidance to smallholder farmers in an easily understandable manner.
slogan: Localized soil analytics, tailored Farm Insights, and hyperlocal AI powered precise input recommendation Software.
